attributes.action: make christmas themed advertising and decorations in comercial outlets before November illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apart from alienatimg those who do not wish to celebrate Christmas, it encourages people to spend more, going further into debt and causing more problems for themselves. In particular advertising to children, who are too innocent to cope with adverts, for 4 months every year is just cruel for  both kids and parents.
